issue.title: [Rust] Allow writing custom FileMetaData k/v pairs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8150](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8150). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to be able to write custom k/v metadata in the rust implementation of parquet. It looks like there was a plan for this previously but it has not been implemented yet.

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/a1eb440c92ae1c8edc93bc9ae646a8e371d756c6/rust/parquet/src/file/writer.rs#L182>

I have a working implementation that adds a `key_value_metadata` field to the `WriterProperties` struct

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8150?focusedCommentId=17065909) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6660
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6660>
